price: (31) And you will not cause failure [to Allāh][1423] upon the earth. And you have not besides Allāh any protector or helper.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
